name: Tsumineko AR 3D
description:
“Tsumineko” became 3D!It corresponds to multiplayer AR.

“Tsumineko” is a game of stacking many, many cats on top of one-another to form a tower of cats high into the sky.
This is a fun game loved by both kids and grown-ups around.

◆How to “Tsumineko”
You can pinch by tapping the cat in the balloon.
Let's drag the cat as it is to get on the stump.
After that, you stack the cat on the cat.

◆Let's enjoy with multiplayer AR.
If you are connected to the same Wi-Fi, you can play together up to 4 people.
Let's stack the cats with everyone cooperating.

◆Let's stack a lot and increase friends!
Depending on the number of cats stacked,the variety of cats to be stack will increase!

◆Share!
The share button is displayed in the upper right corner of the game screen.
Let’s spread your cats best shot with SNS!

Enjoy!
